# Quarto Book — Render and Publish

This chapter shows the minimal `_quarto.yml` and the commands to render and publish the book.

## Example `_quarto.yml` (put in the `book/` folder)

```yaml
project:
  type: book

book:
  title: "Tools in Action — Demo"
  author: "Your Name"
  chapters:
    - index.qmd
    - 01_git.qmd
    - 02_linux_basics.qmd
    - 03_shell_essentials.qmd
    - 04_makefile.qmd
    - 05_sql_sqlite.qmd
    - 06_pandas_joins_parquet.qmd
    - 07_html_scraping.qmd
    - 08_pytest.qmd
    - 09_pytorch_miniloop.qmd
    - 10_quarto_book.qmd

format:
  html:
    theme: default
